items.Justification: While this paper discusses speckle metrology, it is not directly related to adaptive optics, wavefront sensing, or FSOC.

This paper focuses on the fabrication and characterization of optical micro/nanofibers, which is somewhat related to FSOC but not directly to adaptive optics or wavefront sensing.
